snippet.title: Caverns of Mars Recharged | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
In Caverns of Mars: Recharged you descend into tunnels beneath the surface of Mars in a mad dash to destroy the reactor at the furthest depths of the enemy’s underground base. Dodge debris, clear out obstacles, and blast enemies, all while descend at high speed into enemy territory. 

Caverns of Mars: Recharged takes the easy, addictive appeal of the original game and adds more caverns, more challenges, more weapons, modern graphics and leaderboards. And it would not be a Recharged title without an amazing new soundtrack by Megan McDuffee.

Available across all platforms on March 9th

Learn more at: https://link.atari.com/caverns

Join the discussions at: https://discord.gg/nbSURTHANF

#retro #atari #retrogaming #oldschool #gamedev #atari2600
